pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.3.1_0: “Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.4_0: Na pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti,
